description._content: View this large. 2008-01-19 Performance: Spoken Word: The LouderArts Collective 2:00 p.m.-4:00 p.m. Iris and B. Gerald Cantor Auditorium, 3rd Floor Roger Bonair-Agard hosts Brooklyn-based Caribbean members of New York's premier spoken-word collective, the LouderArts Project: Hallie Hobson, Rich Villar, and Cheryl Boyce Taylor, as they perform pieces on identity, immigration, and cultural evolution. 2008-01-20 Special Event: Panel Discussion: Martin Luther King Observed 3:00 p.m.-5:00 p.m. Iris and B. Gerald Cantor Auditorium, 3rd Floor Embracing The Radical King: Prophetic or Passe? is co-hosted by WNY's Brian Lehrer and Civic Frame founder and president, April Yvonne Garrett. Social commentators and the audience explore the nature of the "Radical King" and how he might respond to today's pressing social issues. Portions of the discussion will be broadcast the following day on the Brian Lehrer Show which airs daily from 10 a.m.-noon on 93.9 FM and AM 820. For more information, see www.wnyc.org/events/91596.
